category.name: Thin Client.Manufacturing

preference.name: MEDesignToBom_keep_rep_by_relation
preference.preference_description: Enables keeping the "TC_Is_Represented_By" relation during the removal of a Design to BOM alignment. If set false then the "TC_Is_Represented_By" relation is deleted if it exists. The default value is true.
